1036380.name: The Prometheus Secret Noohra Theme Song
1036380.description:
Theme song single to the The Prometheus Secret Noohra, produced by Ian Anderson and contains real live guitar and drums. The song commences a gentle ambiance but changes to a passionate display of electric guitar as the darkness makes it challenge on the souls of humanity. Later the battle cry of the Lion of Judah appears as light challenges darkness for the redemption of every soul.

Format: MP3
Album Art: Yes
